attributes.action: Call a general election now and bar any MP involved in the expenses scandal from standing [money paid back or not].
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to restore public confidence in the political system, call a general electio. 

Any MP involved in the recent expenses scandal should not be allowed to stand on the basis because if they are able to make such errors of judgement with their own fnances then are they the right people to represent the country?

rejection.details: The PM/Government do not control who stands for seats in the House of Commons. This is a matter for individual political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
